summary: "The Dark Knight" is a 2008 superhero movie directed by Christopher Nolan, following Batman as he teams up with police to fight crime in Gotham City. Their mission is complicated by the Joker, a chaotic villain. The film stars Christian Bale and Heath Ledger, who won many awards for his role. It was shot in Chicago and Hong Kong and was the first major movie filmed with IMAX cameras. The Dark Knight received high praise for its story, visuals, and acting, and is now considered one of the best superhero movies ever made. It inspired many other films with its realistic approach.
title: The Dark Knight
